What will df.iloc[0:3, 1:4] do in Pandas?
Option1: Select rows from index 0 to 2 and columns from index 1 to 3
Option2: Select rows from index 0 to 3 and columns from index 1 to 4

Option4: Select all rows and columns from index 1 to 3
